1996576695977902573.text: Sure, those delivery efficiency numbers come from our 2023 urban logistics report, focusing on smart parcel lockers in buildings. You can find it here: [link to report]. Let me know if you need more details!

1996934379130556727.text: Hi! On Nasdaq, check out robotics stocks like Symbotic (SYM) for warehouse automation or iRobot (IRBT) for smart delivery tech. These are transforming last-mile logistics and parcel handling in smart buildings—exciting times for efficient deliveries!

2000983547168088117.text: Absolutely agree—last-mile logistics needs a boost! We're making it happen with smart parcel lockers built right into buildings, cutting down on missed deliveries and hassle. How can we help upgrade yours?

2012692502923424092.text: Thanks! We're excited about smart lockers too—they're revolutionizing last-mile deliveries in busy cities. Upgrades to our integrated systems are on track for Q3 this year, focusing on seamless building embeds. Happy to chat options—DM me?

2012728151126749397.text: Excited to hear that! Our Q3 upgrades are all about seamless last-mile deliveries in urban spots, perfect for smart building setups like parcel lockers. Looking forward to your DM to dive in.
